member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_H264
member.summary: Represents codec configuration for H.264 encoding.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_H264.ConfigurationFlags
member.summary: A bitwise OR combination of flags from the enumeration defining the set of enabled codec features.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_H264.DirectModeConfig
member.summary: A value from the enumeration specifying direct modes.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_H264.DisableDeblockingFilterConfig
member.summary: A value from the enumeration specifying configuration related to the disable_deblocking_filter_idc syntax from the H.264 specification.
